cartoon | name | description
🎨🌊🔭 | plot_average_spectrum    | Plot the weighted average flux per wavelength.
🎨🌊💎 | plot_spectral_resolution | Plot the spectral resolution per wavelength.
🎨🌊🎧 | plot_noise_comparison    | Plot the measured and expected scatter per wavelength.
🎨🌊🥦 | plot_noise_comparison_in_bins | Plot measured and expected scatter in different size bins.
